snippet.title: Botany Manor - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Botany Manor in this latest trailer for the upcoming exploration puzzle game, including your objectives, a peek at the relaxing location, and more. 

Set in a stately home in 19th century England, you play as inhabitant Arabella Greene, a retired botanist. Explore your house and gardens, filled with research, to figure out the ideal habitat of forgotten flora. Grow each plant to discover the mysterious qualities they hold. Botany Manor is coming to PC, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.
